Franchise leaders

Source: R/league_leaders.R
franchise_leaders.Rd

Gets franchise leader information for by specified input for specific teams

franchise_leaders(
  teams = NULL,
  all_teams = FALSE,
  remove_inactive_teams = F,
  modes = "Totals",
  season_types = c("Regular Season"),
  return_message = TRUE,
  nest_data = FALSE
)

Arguments

teams

vector of team names
all_teams

if TRUE returns all teams
remove_inactive_teams

if TRUE removes inactive teams
modes

mode of search

  • Totals

  • Per Game
season_types

type of season

  • Regular Season

  • Playoffs

  • PlayIn

'

Value

a tibble

See also

Other teams: drafts(), seasons_rosters(), teams_players_stats(), teams_rankings()

Other leaders: metrics_leaders()

Examples

franchise_leaders(teams = "Brooklyn Nets", modes = c("Totals"))
